attributes.action: Abolish  the Children, Schools and Families Bill .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Attack on parental choice

Currently parents have the legal right to choose which sex education lessons their child attends, if any. But under Government plans this freedom of choice would end on the child's 15th birthday. In future we fear that this choice could end even earlier.Homosexual partnerships are 'valued'as normal when common decency says that marraige between a man and a woman is the accepted and moral way to live. Children should be taught that .

All primary schools will be required by law to teach children as young as seven that homosexual civil partnerships and other unmarried sexual relationships should be 'valued' on a par with marriage.
